title: Forever and Ever
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>I have to say it... Somehow, the story keeps getting more exaggerated... Today... Today for sure!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Ah, Yohane-san!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Front and rear, clear.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>There’s nothing flying in the sky!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s not going to work out if all three of them are together...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>What’s the matter?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>You’re scrunching up your face...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Could it be... The angels’ army is already here!? Yohane-chan, come to Nijigasaki!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Eh? No, um, let me explain properly, about this fallen angel thing...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>You don’t have to force yourself if you don’t want to say it...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Yeah. We’re on your side.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>No matter what happens... We’ll protect you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Please, just listen to me~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
